keyword: how many calories are in a mcdonalds breakfast burrito
title: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Breakfast Burrito?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a McDonald's breakfast burrito, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Breakfast Burrito?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage Breakfast Burrito; flour tortilla with sausage, scrambled eggs, onions, green peppers, cheddar cheese, and tomato salsa.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on official McDonald's data. Check app or menu for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's breakfast burrito has 300 kcal, with 15 g protein and 26 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Bacon Breakfast Burrito instead of sausage

faqs.q: How many calories are in a McDonald's breakfast burrito?
faqs.a: One standard sausage version has 300 kcal.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a McDonald's breakfast burrito?
faqs.a: About 15 g of protein per burrito.

faqs.q: Does a McDonald's breakfast burrito have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 810 mg due to sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in McDonald's breakfast burrito?
faqs.a: 26 g total carbs, mostly from the tortilla.

faqs.q: How does the bacon burrito compare in calories?
faqs.a: Slightly higher at 310 kcal versus the sausage version.
